title: Food Over Medicine: The Conversation That Could Save Your Life
description:
Glen Merzer, Pamela A. Popper, "Food Over Medicine: The Conversation That Could Save Your Life"

Nearly half of Americans take at least one prescription medicine, with almost a quarter taking three or more, as diseases such as diabetes, obesity, and dementia grow more prevalent than ever. The problem with medicating common ailments, such as high blood pressure or elevated cholesterol, is that drugs treat symptomsÃ¢â‚¬â€and may even improve test resultsÃ¢â‚¬â€without addressing the cause: diet.
